FuncDef: This command displays call trace information for the active IPoE session.
CLIs: session sap <sap-id> mac <ieee-address> [ { circuit-id <circuit-id> | remote-id <remote-id> } ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a circuit ID that identifies an IPoE session.
Specifies a MAC address that identifies an IPoE session.
Specifies a remote ID that identifies an IPoE session.
Specifies the name of the trace that triggered the job.
Specifies the SAP ID that identifies an IPoE session.
